sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const CraftCard = ({ craft }) => { let hearts = craft.difficulty === "easy" ? (hearts = "游눜") : craft.difficulty === "medium" ? (hearts = "游비游비") : (hearts = "仇벒잺仇벒잺仇벒잺"); return (

{craft.name}


{hearts}


{craft.description}


{craft.notes}



); }; export default CraftCard;
